title: We four.
author: Rees, L. L.
snippet: enjoy this ride as mucli as upon Loch Katrine in coiiSe- quence of a disagreeable wind, that rose upon the water and seized us in damp clutches. Several residences belonging to the nobility were pointed out to us on the banks of the lake, the most unpretending of which is the Buchanan House, belonging;  to the Duke of Montrose. He owns the coach-road through the Trossachs, and a formal request must be made to him every summer to allow the diligences to pass through his gates.
